parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the interactive messaging application.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description: The message body. The value is a JSON string.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the message group.

parameters.name: OperatorUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user who performs the operation.

parameters.name: ReceiverIdList
parameters.description: The list of users to receive the message.

parameters.name: SkipAudit
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the message requires Alibaba Cloud content moderation. Valid values:

- **true**: does not require content moderation.
- **false**: requires content moderation. This is the default value.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the message. A value that is less than or equal to 10000 specifies a system message. A value that is greater than 10000 specifies a custom message.
